metadata.inclusion: Turn off power to the smart bulb, then turn on power - the bulb will blink twice indicating inclusion mode. If successful, the bulb will blink once more
metadata.exclusion: Turn the power on - the bulb will blink twice indicating exclusion mode. The bulb will blink once more when exclusion is successful
metadata.reset: Power the bulb on/off 6 times (between 0.5-2 seconds each time). The bulb will flash twice to indicate factory reset
